name: Tribes-X (itch)
description: Tribes-X - hardcore 2D shooter. Gameplay is similar to Quake III but in 2D. This is an online shooting game, with high-quality graphics and excellent sound. Game based on the original Need for kill (NFK) engine (Made by 3d[power]) with many new features and bug fixes, that makes game much more interesting. Beside standard game types (Deathmatch, Team Deathmatch, Capture The Flag, Domination, RAIL Arena), there were added new ones. Physics/Graphics/Sounds and e.t.c was also updated and modified. Standard game package contains: a lot of great maps, models, bots, simple and powerful map editor. It's standalone full-featured mod that doesn't require any additional files.
